messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did elder things descend upon Earth from the stars?
A billion years ago
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the state of the elder things' technology in the early twenty-first century?
Hundreds of years advanced beyond what humans know
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current state of the elder things' ability to control the planet?
They controlled only one city
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current state of the elder things' ability to create artificial heaters?
They barely had the technology to create artificial heaters
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the elder things' technology and ability to fly through space unaided?
They lost both their greatest technologies and their ability to fly through space unaided.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was left of the elder things' technological mastery after they left Earth?
Almost no traces of their technological mastery.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is it believed that the elder things created the Great White Space dimension?
Yes, it is reasonable to presume that they constructed the Great White Space dimension.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the likely existence of other pocket dimensions created by the elder things?
Probably varying in size and secretly existing until discovered by some hapless traveller or sorcerer.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the elder things' technological hold on the planet?
Their hold diminished, and they controlled only one city in the end.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is believed to be the case with elder things among the stars?
They are believed to still exist and remember their ancient secrets.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the Great White Space?
It is a dimension constructed by the elder things.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is a unique feature of the lamp of Alhazred?
It has many curious drawings, together with letters and pictures arranged into words in a language unfamiliar.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the shape of the enchanted lamp?
It has the shape of a small oblong pot
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect does the lamp have on those who inhale its vapors?
It sends the minds of those who inhale them into ecstasies of vision
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the lamp is lit?
The lamp gives forth vapors that send the minds of those who inhale them into ecstasies of vision.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Yithians' philosophical view of life?
They tend to be reactive, quickly and adeptly formulating new technology as it is required, but in general their curiosity does not drive them toward invention.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What abilities do the Yithians have regarding time?
The Yithians are the only technical race able to move up and down the time stream at will, and they even avoid the dreaded hounds of Tindalos.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Yithians' ability to conquer time called?
Their ability to move up and down the time stream at will
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Yithians' ability to affect the fourth dimension?
They have invented devices that affect the fourth dimension
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Lightning Gun used for?
To combat the carnivorous flying polyps
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many charges does a common variety of the Lightning Gun contain?
32 charges
